title: MP3 Database Query Service (Custom Service with Multiple Clients)
description: A more advanced ROS1 service example where a server manages a simulated MP3 database and multiple clients perform different types of queries. This task evaluates the modelâ€™s ability to translate custom service definitions, internal server state, and multiple ROS client interactions.

directories.ros1_code: Ros1 service server/client templates with custom .srv
directories.docker: Docker build environment for ROS1/ROS2 translation

expected_behavior: Server launches successfully, clients make valid queries, and server responds with correct filtered track lists.
